website_summaries.verdict: The Sony STR-DN1060 AV receiver offers great sound and is chock full of solid streaming audio features, but rivals are nipping at its heels.
pros: The Sony STR-DN1060 offers solid design, a high level of usability, and excellent home theater surround sound
The AV receiver offers a number of useful features including Bluetooth headphone support and multiroom capability
cons: Its sound is somewhat more suited to movies than music
The multiroom SongPal Link app isn't as robust as some competitors' offerings
Spotify Connect not available at launch

customer_reviews.title: Future proof or near as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal. This is an HDCP 2.2 Capable rig that is also ARM capable. It is a future proof piece with fully functioning updatability being network capable. The ability to have two sound zones and connect to wireless speakers is great. The emulation software sony puts on these is second to none quite literally in the consumer marketplace. Simply put, the sound is incredible. If you care that much, then this is not just worth the money, it is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Stapp

customer_reviews.title: kind of a waste of money really for 4K video
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking it would pass the 4K and HDR10 from a XB1S. It'll pass 4K at 24 frames, but nothing higher, and not HDR10. So basically I'm just using the spdif port to process audio, the XB1S goes straight to the TV for video. At the moment, I have nothing else connected to the Sony receiver....kind of a waste of money really for 4K video, but a nice enough amp/receiver.
customer_reviews.author: William D

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver for your money. Has great connectivity and it's plenty powerful for mid to high range speakers but the best part about this receiver is the quality of sound during movies! This is the best sounding receiver I've ever heard. Not bad at all for music either. If you purchase this receiver, make sure to grab the Sony SongPal app to control everything from your smart phone. I don't use a 4k TV so I'm not sure how the upscaling works but I have a Gaming PC and the Xbox One running through it without any lag whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Through it to the trash can after 2.5 year.
customer_reviews.text: It was OK when it works. The HDMI completely had no output signal last week. I tried all I can do from the Sony technical support website. I called the Sony support guy. He sent me to the 3rd party repair store. It cost $200 to $300 to fix it. So I think I should add a few hundred dollars to buy a new one, a different brand can last longer. And put my Sony STR-DN1060 to the trash can. It worked 2.5 years since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Water

customer_reviews.title: NO CHROMECAST VIDEO
customer_reviews.text: wanted to clarify something to potential buyers, the "Chromecast Built in" feature is for audio only, it will not stream video from Netflix or any other streaming service through the amp to the tv. I bought this amp thinking that i could eliminate my chromcast dongle and use it on another tv, but sadly i could not. As i read through the product description, i does state that the chromecast feature is for audio, so i cannot blame Sony for misleading, but if anyone has used a chromecast before, you would assume it would cast both audio and video. Other than that, the amp works as described
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great receiver for the $
customer_reviews.text: This receiver has many features all of higher-priced receivers. It works great with both Harmony remotes (zone 2 control is added by adding Zone 2 as another device, append the model number with Zone 2 afterwards when adding via my harmony) and control4 processors. I wish it had AirPlay video and Android DLNA cast video built into it (Chromecast is 35 bucks this can't be a hard feature to add).
customer_reviews.author: Keither357

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only one year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought receiver one year ago and was using it without any issues. Just a couple of days ago, the HDMI input/output for my DVD player, cable box, and Roku have all failed on the receiver. I checked the cables and they are all in working order. Not expecting a receiver to go out so quickly since I purchased this unit expecting quality and reliability. Annoyed and upset that I have to shop for a new one since there was no option through Amazon to return this product or report a problem since I bought it 1 year and 1 wk ago.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good system for the price. Gives you multiple options to hook up several components, and the sound is great. The one flaw is that it says it has wifi; so I was expecting internet radio. You have to work through Google apps. It doesn't have internet radio. Basically, I used my phone for internet and then use Bluetooth to run it through the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy

customer_reviews.title: This thing Rocks
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is awesome picture and sound quality is great! Would recommmend anyone looking for a replacement or addition has many settings to which you can set to your liking I currently have 2 12" cerwin vega and cerwin vega center and Sony satellites and has no trouble making them move Weatherby music or movies or watching the sound quality is awesome
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: NO HDR SUPPORT COMING
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this receiver because it was said to be future proof as it was marketed to receive a firmware update to provide HDR passthrough. I contacted Sony Support and it was recently decided that Sony will not upgrade the 1060 for HDR passthrough. They would rather have you buy 1070 which is the exact same product with HDR passthrough. DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE OR BUYING A TV WITH HDR.
customer_reviews.author: Colin James

customer_reviews.title: A Very Great Order!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the Receivers that I had to get in my basement and it is the Greatest one that I Ordered and it WORKS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing receiver Update: Worked fine for about 4 months, then it wouldn't turn on. Sent out for repairs: 5 to ship, 7-10 business days for the repair, 5 days to ship back. No Loaner Unit While I Wait. I always had the unit on top of the center console, never enclosed where it could easily overheat, even the platform it was sitting on was vented from below. No recent wiring changes before the problem, and none of the tricks online worked (disconnecting all wires, resetting to factory defaults). Will Update As Repair Progresses.
customer_reviews.author: iPcGameAddict

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with the user interface and features but most especially the audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: al arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased with the integration of this AV receiver to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with the integration of this AV receiver to my home theater. Old 5.1 speakers work great! Really nice to have ARC compatible devices. Turn on the AV when the TV is on and the TV speakers shut down for the AV control. No issues (so far).
customer_reviews.author: Stonehollow

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality AV receiver
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased overall getting everything setup took some time as well as adjusting the audio. I agree with another reviewer that the audio favors the high side but once adjusted it sounds great and works very well. It does get warm when driven so if in enclosed space you may need to allow for ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave 2 star is its not even 4 years old and it died. I tried to turn it on lot of different ways but it did not work. So, I am kind of nervous to buy the same one again. Sound is awesome, works perfectly. It is flawless piece but you are worried if it happens again. $550 is lot of money to take this risk again.
customer_reviews.author: Suraj p upreti

customer_reviews.title: I love the on screen menu and the ability to program ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the on screen menu and the ability to program sound modes directly into my Harmony remote. I ordered and sent back a Harman Kardon after being extremely disappointed with it's menu setup and sound. The analog direct feature really sounds great when listening to music. This is my second Sony receiver and I doubt I'll buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: NotCoolBro

customer_reviews.title: Stereo - high marks / Documentation - low marks
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Having to go to Sony site for documentation...which isn't laid out all that great...is a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Does not pass traffic to HDMI ports.  Hard to diagnose.
customer_reviews.text: Dead. Does not pass traffic to HDMI port. I tried everything. Should have called SONY support earlier. I thought the problem was me.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Niekamp

customer_reviews.title: Sony always delivers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this receiver knowing Sony always puts out quality receivers. I hooked it up to my recently upgraded surround sound (7.1 MartinLogan Speakers all around), and it was a flawless experience. Wifi was easy to setup, firmware upgrade took 8 minutes, AirPlay worked like a charm, and one of my favorite minor features is the fact that it accepts USB drives, and plays FLAC (lossless). So I'm able to easily listen to my music in FLAC Format... Huge plus for me
customer_reviews.author: 801shirts

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp sound
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this was so that I could pair it via Bluetooth with the music on my phone. It sounds great. I especially like the feature where it will automatically select the right settings based on where your speakers are located.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Auto

customer_reviews.title: Not my first choice.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, so I like Sony products I received the model above this one, it works good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Little

customer_reviews.title: This receiver is awesome. Setting it up was mentally exhausting
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is awesome. Setting it up was mentally exhausting. But the sound and decibel level is great! And it arrived when they said it would. If it was easier to set up I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Laflin

customer_reviews.title: Chrome/Google Audio Only - No Chromecast hardware built in.
customer_reviews.text: Great home theater receiver for setups that are small-medium. Enough power to really bring those movies to life. With plenty of HDMI ports, you won't have any trouble connecting everything form 3D BluRay players to gaming consoles to your mobile devices! Only caveat, the Google Audio play is audio only and not a 'Chromecast' replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver. I have 7 different stereos and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Receiver. I have 7 different stereos and this one was easy to install. Has great capability in producing power and connects wirelessly with ease. iPhone can control it also.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Mccandless

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This system continues to do everything I waited to find in a system, lots of connectivity options, excellent sound and amazing quality. I love you Sony!!
customer_reviews.author: James Randles

customer_reviews.title: Very good performance in nearly every aspect
customer_reviews.text: Very good performance in nearly every aspect. Some problems setting up DLNA functions/ playing music from network server/ attaching to other networked devices (SongPal application a little wonky), but very solid in all basic functionality.
customer_reviews.author: BlabbetyBlah

customer_reviews.title: 1 speakers the sound was awesome. Nice system for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lack of substantive owners manual was frustrating, especially me not being a techy. However, once I got it hooked up (with the help of a friend) and pair and calibrated with a set of new Energy 5.1 speakers the sound was awesome. Nice system for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work after 2 1/2 years and is past the 2 year warranty. I had it on a surge protector and off during a storm but it is completely fried anyway. Look for another receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RonDel
customer_reviews.text: Love this receiver sound quality is amazing. The menu is so simple to use. Would definitely recommend. Before buying this product i did some research and for the price and the value you getting great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, easy to use. Very intuitive. Reliable connectors. Saved $200.00 over the price of a similar receiver from Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: High Plains Drifter

customer_reviews.title: ... products by other manufacturers - this one is a delight. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: After a number of returned products by other manufacturers - this one is a delight. Easy to set up. Sound - even from MP3's is spectacular. Should have looked at this one first.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bradford Senden

customer_reviews.title: Better than the theater!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Sounds wonderful. It doesn't sound as good as a movie theater... it sounds better! Booming bass from the subwoofer and fantastic surround sound from 7 speakers. Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Receivers very easy to hook up and sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Receivers very easy to hook up and sound is excellent, highly recommend, in my opinion very easy to set up and operate than pioneer receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Dhardi

customer_reviews.title: Works excellently
customer_reviews.text: Device functions as expected. The menus are easier to navigate than previous models. Audio quality is very high for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best receivers I have purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best receivers I have purchase. It is HDCP 2.2-compliant, meaning that it has the capability of reproducing 4K video to your 4K TV without any issues. One added bonus is that it is able to receive and transmit Bluetooth signals, excellent when connecting to Bluetooth headphones. Easy to setup and configure. I connected to my wireless network and updated the firmware with no issues. It provides a excellent audio quality as well a video quality. I would highly recommend the SONY STRDN1060 for anyone that loves great video and audio entertainment and anyone that wants to have the comfort of knowing they are prepared for the future of 4K video entertainment
customer_reviews.author: T. Ware

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound.
customer_reviews.text: It was time for an upgrade and this one sounds great. Auto calibration couldn't be easier and the GUI is better than previous models based on other reviews I've read. One drawback is that it will not pass thru the component video to HDMI out...other than that I'm happy with my purchase & the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: A well made Sony product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. It is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: This lasted just short of one year. Had keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This lasted just short of one year. Had keep rebooting it by unplugging it at least once a week since it was new and now it powers up for a second but does not actually come on and then turns its self off. A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gurr

customer_reviews.title: Great price and features
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied so far. The user interface blows away others I have experienced recently (Yamaha receiver). The sound is very good and fast switching between inputs. I have a lot more to check out and test but so far very pleased. The manual and all other info you need is simply online--no problem. The setup for my subwoofer was a little weird but it's good to go now.
customer_reviews.author: rtr801

customer_reviews.title: Bass, wow.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stereo, brought my klipsch speakers to life. Now I have insane amounts of bass.
customer_reviews.author: Mahny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased lets see if the receiver holds up my last one went ten years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Comes through with a Great Receiver
customer_reviews.text: I spent over a month analyzing performance data and customer feedback on stereo receivers before I chose the Sony STRDN1060. Nothing came close to its performance for the money. Setup was super easy. I especially liked the speaker balancing function using the included balance microphone. My speakers are better balanced now than they have every been. The Amazon price was also very good. The price-matcher app from the credit card company could not find a better price. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Badog

customer_reviews.title: Really great 7 channel receiver
customer_reviews.text: Really great 7 channel receiver. Hooked up to Polk S35 center, Polk OMW3 L/R front speakers, Polk in ceining speakers x4 and Sony SACS9 sub. Really makes the room thump.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Fam

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for this is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Paired with Onkyo SKS-HT540B the SOUND IS AMAZING very happy with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with my new receiver. It works great and was easy to setup using the on-screen menu. It arrived as promised with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Don in TN

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad unit. Pretty simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad unit. Pretty simple to use. Every now and again I have to unplug it to get it to power off. After that, plug it back in and all runs well again.

customer_reviews.title: Very high performance for the price range. The setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high performance for the price range. The setup is not for beginners. This amp has more than enough power to run a premium home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rykse

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Just what I needed to finish my theatre experience.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good receiver, terrible manual.
customer_reviews.text: The receiver sounds good though not as transparent as my former Adcom separates. The user manual consists of one fold-out sheet with a few diagrams. If you knew nothing about hooking up a stereo you'd be up the creek. No good user manual is available so I don't really know what's happening with some of their "trick" sound effects like A.F.D, or multi-stereo, etc. The included microphone aided speaker balancing during initial setup, but most things are learn as you go, or as you stumble upon something. I guess I just assumed that they would want to include a comprehensive user manual so the end user could get full benefit from this unit. Extremely disappointed in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gibaud

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I haven't noticed any visual or audio problems
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem setting up. Initially the sound would not pass through with speakers off. Reset everything and then reconfigured it and worked perfectly. I use it for my outdoor theater. Works great and I haven't noticed any visual or audio problems.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Opper

customer_reviews.title: I lov it nice receiver it's so powerful when we clean soon highly ...
customer_reviews.text: I lov it nice receiver it's so powerful when we clean soon highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: home stereo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Easy to install and use. Very intuitive on-screen guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: ... a Denon AVR1713 to this Sony and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Denon AVR1713 to this Sony and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: This receiver does not do HDMI output to multiple zones ...
customer_reviews.text: This receiver does not do HDMI output to multiple zones. I am so bummed. I even talked to online help at a different retailer and they assured me it does. Other than that missing feature, receiver works ok. The menus are very clunky. The app is a joke. The Bluetooth works if you are standing next to the receiver. I had to get a converter and optical cable to stream my Apple Music to my outdoor zone 2.
customer_reviews.author: Joey P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compatability and great wireless functionality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for 5.1 surround in the living room and separate signals on my back covered patio. Used in conjunction with def tech outdoor speakers and osd volume control for zone 2. Perfect compatability and great wireless functionality. Just wish Sony included this in their premium product lines.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that my Yamaha TSR 5790 died again. I am soooo happy with my Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Willey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great receiver if your into 4K
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver if your into 4K. If your familiar with how other sony a/v receivers hookup and setup getting it up and working is a snap. I have the Directv Genie system and it upscales all the HD channels to 4K and the SD channels to HD. I have this hooked up to a Samsung UN60JU7100 and the picture quality is absolutely stunning! If you have a Blu-ray player with 4K upscaling your viewing with be almost life like! The sound quality is excellent. I would highly recommend this receiver to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Had some troubles at first changing among various inputs (seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: Had some troubles at first changing among various inputs (seemed that the BD DVD input only provided an image) but I changed the output from the one labeled "hdcp 2.2" to the one labeled "out B Hdmi zone" and everything is just peachy!
customer_reviews.author: Derek M. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Not as promoted
customer_reviews.text: Sony promoted different zones. We listen to music from our TV that we wanted to pipe to the patio speakers. This receiver does not allow me to switch from family room to patio without using a different music source.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instalation was very easy. Sound is first class
customer_reviews.text: Realy excelente product!! The instalation was very easy. Sound is first class, as well as features. Plays FLAC hires sound. The only issue I found is that it ships without a full manual. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Eduardo Artaxo NT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Receiver!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a replacement for an older model. We lost it in a lightning strike. We've been very happy with this receiver, so we purchased the newer model. Very nice sound. Works well with all of our other components.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: For those considering this receiver...
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review about my impressions of this Sony in the future... But I think it's important for those who are considering this product to know that in order to set up this receiver and access most of its functions, you MUST have it hooked up a monitor or TV!
customer_reviews.author: Tloc89

customer_reviews.title: Seller was good, product was garbage
customer_reviews.text: After spending a week troubleshooting and hours on the phone with Sony support, I had to send it back to the factory for repairs right out of the box. It is not damaged, certain functions just don't work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wells

customer_reviews.title: PURE CINEMATIC ACOUSTIC BLISS
customer_reviews.text: In a word, AWESOME, AMAZING, WOW, ENDLESS OPTIONS, POWER HOUSE, THUMP BOX, PURE CINEMATIC ACOUSTIC BLISS (OK, maybe that was a couple more words than one). Best receiver on the market, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Boston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment, but there is no manual and the support from Sony absolutely sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design and plenty of easy to use features
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this receiver. Sleek design and plenty of easy to use features.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: I was told by a Sony Customer Representative that this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a Sony Customer Representative that this receiver was compatible with my TV. I found out it is not. She had no idea what she was selling and now I cannot return it despite being brand new and still in the box. I will call Amazon and make sure they take this receiver back. I was also told by a friend of mine who is a Amazon customer that I could return within 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D

customer_reviews.title: Look else where, this thing aint worth 2 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 10 months then died no sound no picture piece of crap. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Otis Dawg

customer_reviews.title: To make matters worse, Sony customer service was disappointing and reluctant to ...
customer_reviews.text: This receiver arrived defective, turning on and off every 5 seconds. Normally, I'd assume it's an anomaly, but this is the second Sony receiver that has failed on me. I bought this to replace my defective Sony STR-DN1030 which had a power module failure after only 2.5 years. To make matters worse, Sony customer service was disappointing and reluctant to help me out. Ultimately, the poor quality control and customer service has led me to switch to Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: Sony STR-DN1060
customer_reviews.text: Great product as u open the box all u see is this shiny amazing home theater receiver I love when I open a fresh package just give you the new brand smell but other than that when turn on receiver makes a small buzzing sound don't know why though but this product is powerful and easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Major Defect which Sony refuses to fix
customer_reviews.text: Both the STRDN1060 and the STRDN860 have same defect where Bluetooth devices connection stop working after multiple connections. Feature gets enabled if device is reset to factory defaults. Issue was surfaced to Sony 6 months and still cannot them to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Checked all of the settings, followed all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Checked all of the settings, followed all of the directions and issues still persist. I even hooked my speakers up to different amp no issues. I know the problem isn't with the tv or with the speakers. This amp continues to distort sound and not work. Very unhappy paid the additional cost for the new model; along with new speakers and 75 inch Sony TV very unhappy and will not purchase again. Very dissatisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a headache to be useful
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have both have technical degrees and after hours and hours of trying to get it to connect correctly to the LCD TV and DVD and other peripherals it still didn't work. It went back. I should not have to pay a tech geek $250 to get it to work correctly with the rest of my audiovisual systems. The absence of a real users manual and having to rely on "online" directions is unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Web Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Owners Manual
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Sony fan for many years but I don't think I will buying any of there products again. I am not happy they supply no owners any more. It's a hassle to find the info on the Internet. I am have trouble get a picture through to my TV. Keep getting message check HDMI connection well it is connected. I don't know what the problem is, after it it sets a while the picture comes through. No info on the 2.2 port. Can't find the info on Internet. I think I should return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth N.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The unit has no AM tuner. Some how this was missed before purchase. Speedy refund.
customer_reviews.author: re21253

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Never used it! , got it to replace with the Yamaha 7790; the sound of Yamaha is soo much better specially for music. Hust hooked up the extra surround speakers and it makes the experience of TV watching a whole new thing!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto P.

product_meta.title: Sony STRDN1060 7.2 Channel Hi-Res WiFi Network AV Receiver (Black)
product_meta.description: Enjoy superior sound while easily steaming music with built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth & Air Play. With 7.2 channels & 165 watts of power, driven by the largest capacitors and transformer in its class, its legendary Sony sound that really connects. Featuring 4K resolution pass-through and upscaling, high-res audio compatibility, 10 HD inputs and support for 2 separate powered zones, this receiver is the ultimate high resolution sound stage for your music, Blu-ray movies, games and more.
feature_bullets: 7.2 Ch. 1155W A/V Receiver, Exceptional circuitry and structure yield incredible audio performance, 6-in/2-out HDMI flexibility with HDCP 2.2 support (1-in/1-out), Dual- band Wi-Fi for Airplay, DLNA, and Google Cast for Audio

Google Cast for Audio easy streaming of your favorite music apps, Expand your listening with powerful multi-room capability, Supports Hi-Res audio playback via LAN, HDMI, USB, Enhanced setup and usability via rich GUI and streamlined remote

HDMI Audio Return Channel for easy playback of TV audio, Flexible 2nd and 3rd Zones with HDMI, variable Line, and Speaker outputs, Navigate content & control w/the Song AL mobile app, Stream music from mobile devices w/Bluetooth & NFC connections

Stream audio from the AVR to compatible Bluetooth headphones, LDAC for an optimized Bluetooth audio streaming experience, DSEE HX up scales USB, Home Network and streaming audio to near Hi-Res quality. Supports 4K upscaling and pass-through with support for 60p, 4K content, Pure Direct audio mode for a noise-free, audio signal path, HDMI out w/ 24p, Deep Color and TRILUMINOS Color pass through support
